_comment: ðŸ¤– Universal AI Token Tracker v3.0 - Intelligent Budget Management
_disclaimer: Limits are CONSERVATIVE (intentionally 10-20% lower). You'll get early warnings, not surprises.
_howto: 1. Set 'provider' below  2. Set 'plan'  3. Copy limits from PRESETS (or leave defaults)  4. Done!
_changelog: v3.0: Pre-flight approval, confidence-based estimation, variance learning, emergency reserves, smart batching. Phase 8.7.1 (2026-02-16): Added MODEL_3 support, 2026 market reality integration, architecture model classification for all providers.

PRESETS._note: Comprehensive provider database with 2026 market reality. MODEL_3 providers use fair use dynamic limits (UNKNOWN daily/monthly by design).

api.name: API (Pay-as-you-go)
api.notes: Sonnet: $3/$15, Opus: $15/$75, Haiku: $0.25/$1.25 per 1M tokens. Prompt caching available.

free.name: claude.ai Free
free.notes: Limited Opus usage, lower priority compute. Fair use dynamic throttling.

pro.name: Claude Pro
pro.rate_limit: ~45 messages per 5h session (baseline, varies with prompt size)
pro.notes: 2026 Reality: NO published daily/monthly limits. Uses rolling 5h windows. Usage shared across all Claude Pro access points. Market strategy: elastic compute, dynamic throttling.

team.name: Claude Team
team.notes: $25-30/user/month. Pooled usage, admin panel, central billing. Fair use dynamic throttling.

api.name: Gemini API
api.notes: Pro: $3.50/$10.50, Flash: $0.35/$1.05 per 1M. Up to 1M context (Pro). Free trial credits.

free.name: Gemini Free
free.notes: Limited access to latest models, lower priority. Fair use dynamic throttling.

advanced.name: Gemini Advanced
advanced.notes: $20/month (Google One AI Premium). Long-context enabled, top models. Fair use dynamic throttling.

free.name: Cursor Free
free.notes: Unlimited basic autocompletion. Limited fast AI requests â†’ fallback to slower queue. Fair use dynamic.

pro.name: Cursor Pro
pro.rate_limit: Large allowance of fast premium requests
pro.notes: $20/month. Access to GPT-4/Claude models. Faster responses vs Free. Fair use dynamic throttling.

business.name: Cursor Business
business.notes: $40/user/month. Team management, central billing, policy controls. Fair use dynamic throttling.

individual.name: Copilot Individual
individual.notes: $10/month or $100/year. Unlimited completions, 300 premium chat requests/month. Heavy users may experience throttling.

business.name: Copilot Business
business.notes: $19/user/month. Unlimited completions, 300 premium requests/user/month. Organization deployment, policy controls.

enterprise.name: Copilot Enterprise
enterprise.notes: Custom pricing. Deep GitHub integration, security/compliance features. Request quotas negotiated.

api.name: Mistral API
api.notes: Large: $8/$24, Medium: $2.7/$8.1, Small: $1/$3 per 1M. Strong EU alternative. Often cheaper than GPT-4.

free.name: Groq Free Tier
free.notes: Extremely fast inference. Rate limited by capacity. Popular for real-time apps. Fair use dynamic throttling.

api.name: DeepSeek API
api.notes: Ultra-cheap GPT alternative. Sub-$1/1M input. Rapid adoption 2025-2026. Strong coding.

free.name: Perplexity Free
free.rate_limit: Limited Pro searches per day (not published)
free.notes: Mix of models (OpenAI/Anthropic). Search-first UX. Fair use dynamic throttling.

pro.name: Perplexity Pro
pro.notes: $20/month. Premium models, higher daily limits, priority access. Fair use dynamic throttling.

free.name: Windsurf Free
free.notes: AI IDE with built-in models. Competes with Cursor. Fair use dynamic throttling. Not publicly quantified.

enterprise.name: Windsurf Enterprise
enterprise.notes: Custom per-seat pricing. Enterprise deployment focus. Fair use dynamic throttling.

custom._info: Set your own limits above if your provider isn't listed

disabled._info: Set 'provider' to 'disabled' and 'tracking_enabled' to false to turn off tracking completely

v3_features._comment: Token Control v3.0 - Intelligent Budget Management

auto_approve_thresholds._comment: Tasks below threshold auto-approve (based on current zone)

variance_history._comment: Learning data for estimate accuracy improvement

deferred_tasks._comment: Queue of tasks user chose to defer

industry_reality.shift: From fixed quotas â†’ elastic compute allocation
industry_reality.result: Most providers stopped publishing daily/monthly token limits

MODEL_3.name: Fair Use Dynamic Limits
MODEL_3.official_stance: UNKNOWN (NOT DISCLOSED) is intentional product strategy, not missing data

claude_pro_specifics.baseline_usage: ~45 messages per 5h session (varies with prompt size)
claude_pro_specifics.shared_pool: claude.ai web + VSCode Extension + Claude Code share SAME quota
claude_pro_specifics.throttling: Dynamic, based on system load and user behavior
claude_pro_specifics.reset_behavior: Rolling windows, not fixed midnight resets

framework_philosophy.approach: Warn, don't block ('Ñ‚Ð¸Ñ…Ð¸Ð¹ Ð¿Ð¾Ð¼Ñ–Ñ‡Ð½Ð¸Ðº' - silent helper)

notes: v3.0: Intelligent budget management with pre-flight approval
